means: 影响( affect的第三人称单数 )

sentence.Network_en: Cataracts is a condition that affects the transparency of the lenses.
sentence.Network_cn: 白内障是一种影响晶状体透明性的疾病。

sentence.Network_en: The problem cuts across all socioeconomic lines and affects all age groups.
sentence.Network_cn: 该问题涉及社会经济的方方面面，并影响到所有年龄段的人。

sentence.Network_en: Impotence affects 10 million men in the US alone.
sentence.Network_cn: 仅仅在美国，就有1,000万男子患有阳痿。

PerfectNetExp.abs: your reality affects you and only you ., 您的现实影响到你 , 只有你.
Wool weak - link affects the wool quality and its end - use value ., 羊毛弱节影响着羊毛的品质和使用价值.
The running of the fluidic air - floating system affects the effect of oil - bearing wastewater treatment ., 溶气浮选系统的运行直接影响含油污水的处理效果.

list.abs: 英语词根词缀记忆大全 ... affected a 受感动的；假装的 affection n 感情；友情 affectation n 假装.
新东方GRE词汇 - 豆丁网 ... affected adj. 假装的, 做作的 affection n. 爱,情感 affidavit ? n. 宣过誓的书面陈述.
雅思词汇表_百度文库 ... aerosol 烟，雾；烟雾剂 affect 影响；感动 affiliate 接纳...为会员（或分支）.
雅思词汇表_百度文库 ... aerosol 烟，雾；烟雾剂 affect 影响；感动 affiliate 接纳...为会员（或分支）.

entry.def: If something affects a person or thing, it influences them or causes them to change in some way.

example.ex: Nicotine adversely affects the functioning of the heart and arteries...
example.tran: 尼古丁会对心脏及动脉功能造成损害。

example.ex: More than seven million people have been affected by drought.
example.tran: 已有超过700万的民众受到旱灾的影响。

entry.def: If a disease affects someone, it causes them to become ill.

example.ex: Arthritis is a crippling disease which affects people all over the world.
example.tran: 关节炎是一种会危害全人类健康的致残性疾病。

entry.tran: （感情上）打动，震动，使悲伤（或怜悯）
entry.def: If something or someone affects you, they make you feel a strong emotion, especially sadness or pity.

example.ex: Gregor loved his sister, and her loss clearly still affects him.
example.tran: 格雷戈尔爱他的姐姐，她的去世显然仍令他悲伤不已。

entry.def: If you affect a particular characteristic or way of behaving, you pretend that it is genuine, or natural for you.

example.ex: He listened to them, affecting an amused interest...
example.tran: 他装作饶有兴致地听他们说话。

example.ex: Ms. Redgrave affects a heavy Italian accent.
example.tran: 雷德格雷夫女士假装带有浓重的意大利口音。

auth_sentence.content: This type affects about one in a million people.
auth_sentence.res_content: This type affects about one in a million people.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: This type affects about one in a million people.

auth_sentence.content: It affects oceans, flooding, and biological communities.
auth_sentence.res_content: It affects oceans, flooding, and biological communities.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It affects oceans, flooding, and biological communities.

auth_sentence.content: The chemical, after all, affects many species.
auth_sentence.res_content: The chemical, after all, affects many species.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The chemical, after all, affects many species.

Sentence.sentence: But a lapse (缺失) of integrity also affects our relationships with others.
Another way in which meat production affects the environment is through the use of water and land.
Communications with others not only affects our sense of identity but also directly influences our physical and emotional well-being.
